entry.title: Marked by Fate
entry.summary:
Author: Star_dust_2

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,357Chapters: 11/11Kudos: 14

Summary: Everyone is born with a soulmark—a unique symbol or phrase appearing somewhere on their body that matches their soulmate’s. For some, the mark appears at birth; for others, it appears only after a pivotal moment.
